name: Continuous Girl
description: This is a casual game, the gameplay is eliminated for the connection, and it is suitable for adult children to play because of the thrilling content.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 1 GB available space
